text:
RT @BrianMcHugh2011: Day 63

The next environmental ticking time bomb will be toxic #PFAS and #PFOS chemicals polluting UK waters.
#DarkWat…
RT @JamesBevanEA: I have two exciting opportunities to join my Executive Leadership Team and be at the heart of leading @EnvAgency in creat…

@bedform @EnvAgencyYNE @floodmary @UniOfHull @_aurainnovation Keeping you on your toes...last comment was a dig at #BiodiversityBoris and his #buildbuildbuild attitude.
You must admit it would be ironic if the flood resilience centre got flooded.
As for meeting virtually ...no good at zoom.
One day.

@stwater or @Derbyshirecc  @derbyshiredales @EnvAgency could you let us know what's going wrong at the pumping station A6 N Matlock next to swimming pool? Constant traffic jam, endless stream of tankers to and from Bakewell pumping? This has happened an number of times this year.

text:
It's International Day for Disaster Risk Reduction

Some of our projects involve #NaturalFloodManagement interventions (which also give multiple benefits for the wider env), as seen in this case study from @CommForestTrust @EnvAgencyNW @merseyforest  

https://t.co/4voKeR72Se
RT @EnvAgencyNW: Today Fisheries Officers are disinfecting all of the equipment used on yesterday’s netting job at Three Sisters Recreation…
RT @EnvAgencyNW: Today Fisheries Officers are disinfecting all of the equipment used on yesterday’s netting job at Three Sisters Recreation…

Our second set of marine applications at #JNCC_EO4water gives examples of monitoring sediment disturbance, the Ocean Colour-CCI and detecting #eutrophication and harmful algal blooms from space @CefasGovUK @EnvAgency @PlymouthMarine @CopernicusEU https://t.co/zII2weDbjZ https://t.co/B9J5PvsOvd

@PersianaJune @CllrMaryM @EnvAgencyNW @NorthendenForum @love_northenden Good afternoon Esther,

Could you please confirm the exact location of this, and we will log with our team to investigate and resolve this issue?

@stewart_mounsey @CumbriaCrack @BBC_Cumbria @EnvAgencyNW @TheFloodHub @CarlisleCC @CumbriaCC @RoryStewartUK @DrNeilHudson @VolkerStevinUK @PaulOlejnik So this will push it all back into #CrosbyonEden ??

This @EnvAgency speech on #climate resilient places shows we need #geographers more than ever.
